pages.text: You think back to the good old times when you used to set little traps for your friends: if they touched the wrong block, they were completely buried by sand. By now, your friends are not so easily fooled.$(br2)Modern problems require modern solutions.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Redstone Sand behaves like a solid block until it gets a $(thing)redstone signal$().$(br)The $(thing)redstone trigger$() propagates through all connected blocks, destabilizing them and laws of gravity force them to drop.$(br)$(italic)So much room for possibilities.
